import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-select-role', templateUrl: './select-role.component.html', styleUrls: ['./select-role.component.css'] }) export class SelectRoleComponent { selectedRole: string | null = null; constructor(private auth: AuthService) {} selectRole(role: string) { this.selectedRole = role; } continue() { if (!this.selectedRole) return; this.auth.setRole(this.selectedRole); // <-- call service method } }

Choose Your Role

Please select how you want to continue

User

Book hairstyling batches and manage your bookings.

Create batches and manage student bookings.
